msg: use BundleWiring API instead of PackageAdmin to get wired bundles

msg: [SMX4-1176] Provide src distribution for avro-ipc 1.6.3 bundle

msg: made driver loop robust to forgetting to destroy connectors

author: burn
msg: [UIMA-2378] No longer take settings from descriptors.  Can now pass the Settings in the additionalParams map (key PARAM_EXTERNAL_OVERRIDE_SETTINGS) on the produceAnalysisEngine call.  Default is to use the  -DUimaExternalOverrides files.  Dropped support for long-deprecated implicit overrides.
